nodes.text: The Jilrua system was a star system located in the immediate vicinity of the Oktos Nebula, as part of the Hutt Space portion of the Slice. It contained a blue giant star which was orbited by the desert planet Jilrua, homeworld of the sentient Jilruan species.
The Jilrua system was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square R-12.
